Mar 28, 2016

New Impercept EP

I spent a lot of time a couple months back experimenting with the new version of Reaktor. It doesn't actually work on my studio computer because it requires Yosemite, so it was something I could handle while at home on my newer Macbook Air (which runs Reaktor surprisingly well). For a cover and the title, I blasphemed the only Parvulus Infectus album released while we were together. It's maybe inspired by Bowie's cover for The Next Day.

Check it out here.

Have a listen, and maybe like Impercept on Facebook for more of my musical experiments that don't logically fit with one of my bands.
